caption.title: Number of overlapping Bcd ChIP peaks and Vienna Tile-GAL4 enhancer reporters.
caption.p: Note that some Bcd peaks overlap with more than one Vienna Tile, and vice versa. The reporters expressed at stage 4–6 that overlapped with more than one Bcd peak were excluded from the plot in Figure 2B.

fn.p: *The patterned expression from the 666 Vienna Tiles that drive expression at stage 4–6 was determined by subtracting the number of tiles scored as ‘ubiquitous’ (39) from the total number of tiles.
